html: 1.16.19  5:44 am   first underrated song that comes to mind?

1.16.19  5:13 am   Bill I have to tell you, I used to view your music in a meme way when I was less mature and it was all only for laughs. But now I appreciate your immense talent and imaginative approach to music. I'm wondering if you ever had a similar change of mind about your own music and process? Didyl you have an "a-ha" moment where you started taking it more seriously or were you always pretty serious about your music?
1.16.19  5:09 am   Have you ever thought of including photo as an answer to one of the questions?
1.16.19  5:06 am   What about canada in HotWIG?
1.16.19  4:54 am   i keep forgetting that i've asked questions. Can you help?
1.16.19  4:00 am   Have you ever thought about what It would be like to be a woman?

1.16.19  2:37 am   do you agree that, theoretically, a sconce dropped on the ground in just the right way could produce a catchy tune?

      I've considered my chances of experiencing it, but maybe it's already happened to me and I just didn't notice
1.16.19  2:11 am   does overheated porridge taste good

1.16.19  1:57 am   do you just get that amazing alive feeling at an airport?

     i didn't know others did until that air terminal video u made, so i assume you did. idk it's just like great. or at least it used to be :(
1.16.19  1:54 am   im gonna run for office someday how do I represent you in this democracy
1.16.19  1:28 am   when you answer these questions, are you mostly being ironic or mostly being honest?

1.16.19  1:25 am   Did you plan at the airport terminal to coincide with the 10 year anniversary of "The Miracle on the Hudson"

      or was that just a coincidence?

1.16.19  1:23 am   Is there a correct amount of time to heat porridge?

      I feel like it may be impossible to hit that goldilocks spot between lukewarm and lava.
1.16.19  1:03 am   Dude, that 2017 Kenny Loggins concert is fuckin crazy!
1.16.19  12:40 am   how do you feel about bread?
1.16.19  12:30 am   What question have you been asked that you still have not found the answer to.
1.16.19  12:09 am   why are people the way that they are?
1.15.19  11:49 pm   what is something you think youd say in the future?

1.15.19  11:40 pm   what inspired you to make music,

      and why have you continued so long?
1.15.19  11:03 pm   what's a good example of each interval in Beatles songs?
1.15.19  11:03 pm   Will you ever play Bears live with a 3 to 13 piece band? I know I'd like to see it.
1.15.19  10:54 pm   in hotewig, why do you tell us that chris columbus finds the indies and japan when we are very clearly looking at the west indies and cuba?

1.15.19  10:54 pm   I know you probably get this a lot, what do you use to edit your videos? & what do you use to animate and draw all of your images and effects that you often add to your videos? It's very unique and cool, I'm sorry if you get this asked a lot, I'm trying my best :(
1.15.19  10:45 pm   Should I quit my job and try to make something of myself?
1.15.19  10:22 pm   what is the most socially acceptable way to die?
1.15.19  10:19 pm   1.14.19  7:04 pm do you think you would like to do another podcast at some time?
1.15.19  10:05 pm   Airport Terminal feels like a big departure from your songwriting so far - I love it! Did you deliberately aim to do something different when making this song?
1.15.19  10:00 pm   what airport terminal is your newest tune based off of?
1.15.19  9:58 pm   You have gotten mind-bogglingly good at animation.
1.15.19  9:52 pm   Is the music video of At The Airport Terminal based on that Reddit post praising it?
1.15.19  9:51 pm   what was it about "i want it that way" that made it work so well, from both standpoints of commercial success and songwriting?
1.15.19  9:51 pm   What would be the best way for me to recommend music to you?
1.15.19  9:50 pm   Any advice?
1.15.19  9:43 pm   Why does the ending of Ball & Stick make me feel a deep unease in my soul
1.15.19  9:42 pm   ETHEREAL BEING, we intersect at this moment. Anything to say to a traveler?
1.15.19  9:37 pm   What's your least favorite video on your channel?

1.15.19  9:34 pm   You've been pretty private in the past, is there a reason why you've started doing more interviews and things where you are in people's videos (like the podcast you were on or the genius lyrics video)?
1.15.19  9:27 pm   wowwwww you mixed the airport song sooooo well!
1.15.19  9:20 pm   How long did the video for "At The Airport Terminal" take to edit?
1.15.19  9:04 pm   but what's a good lunch?
1.15.19  9:04 pm   why do you answer people's questions on this site everyday? I know you probably get this question a lot but I'm just wondering

1.15.19  8:59 pm   Have you ever thought about posting every piece of sheet music you have made (whether posted or not)? I understand that could possibly take you a lot of time but I would really love to just be able to access all of that information (especially the earlier songs/jingles). Thanks.
1.15.19  8:53 pm   are there any secrets you're hiding on this website
1.15.19  8:52 pm   do you still handwrite your material, like you did the gorgeous airport terminal solo in the video?
1.15.19  8:49 pm   How can one find happiness while being alone? -Your fellow musician.
1.15.19  8:46 pm   can you play us some sad music?

1.15.19  8:44 pm   any plans about hurling yourself back on schedule,

      and if so, how?

      i'm willing to bet you can do it
1.15.19  8:29 pm   what's a good weeknight meal
1.15.19  8:11 pm   do u have any desire to elaborate on why the bird symbols felt right as the image of death and birth
1.15.19  7:57 pm   how do i get through college without having a breakdown every single week?
